body: You land your most telling blows in desperate situations.
name: Desperate Swing
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Halflings/New Racial Rules/Halfling Feats/Desperate Swing

sections.body: Cautious Fighter, base attack bonus +1, halfling.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: Once per day, you can make a single melee attack while taking the total defense action. You take a –4 penalty on attack rolls when making this attack. You also gain a +4 bonus on critical confirmation rolls made while fighting defensively or making an attack of opportunity using this feat.
